title: Logo Serif Font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114139im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fs%20logo_6609.png)

I've been searching for the serif font used on this logo. I used the WhatTheFont! tool but no luck in identification.  
Any assistance would be much appreciated! Thank you!

Font: 

 Kozuka Mincho 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114139/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: hstryk

comments.content: You can find it as the latin-subset of Japanese supporting fonts **[Kozuka Mincho](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114139/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Kozuka%20Mincho%20Std%20-%20R&fid=2748b8115b9cfb24cfcf92cc821208c1&fsize=60&text=shipping.com&fit=1)** by Masahiko Kozuka and **[Ryo Text Plus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114139/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Ryo%20Text%20PlusN%20-%20R&fid=096b9aeb1ab4365cfc8d0fc927719fc2&fsize=60&text=shipping.com&fit=1)** by Ryoko Nishizuka, both available from Adobe
